virtual-scroll-horizontal.desc: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

virtual-scroll-slice-size.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtual-scroll-item-size.desc: Default size of an option (representing height for default mode or width for horizontal mode), in pixels; This value is used for rendering the initial list; Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.desc: Size of the sticky part at the start of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.desc: Size of the sticky part at the end of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

index.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)

scrollUp.desc: Specify if the list scrolls up

virtual-scroll.desc: Emitted when the virtual list scrolls

details.desc: Object of properties on the new scroll position

index.desc: Index of the list item that was scrolled into view (0 based)

from.desc: The index of the first list item that is rendered (0 based)

to.desc: The index of the last list item that is rendered (0 based)
